tasks.label: Restart y2s_bot
tasks.command: launchctl kickstart -k gui/$(id -u)/com.y2s.bot && echo 'y2s_bot restarted successfully' || echo 'Failed to restart y2s_bot'

tasks.label: Restart y2s_web
tasks.command: launchctl kickstart -k gui/$(id -u)/com.y2s.web && echo 'y2s_web restarted successfully' || echo 'Failed to restart y2s_web'
